00027 #include "lbann/layers/lbann_input_layer_distributed_minibatch.hpp"

00033 using namespace std;
00034 using namespace El;

00036 
00037 lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch::input_layer_distributed_minibatch(lbann_comm* comm, uint mini_batch_size, std::map<execution_mode, DataReader*> data_readers, std::vector<regularizer*> regs)
00038   : input_layer(comm, mini_batch_size, data_readers, regs), Xs(comm->get_model_grid())
00039 {
00040   //  Index = index;
00041   m_root = 0;
00042   m_num_data_per_epoch = 0;
00043 
00044 }
00045 
00046 void lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch::setup(int num_prev_neurons) {
00047   if(io_layer::m_data_sets_span_models) {
00048     io_layer::setup_data_readers(0, Layer::comm->get_num_models() * Layer::m_mini_batch_size,
00049                                  Layer::comm->get_model_rank() * Layer::m_mini_batch_size);
00050   }else {
00051     io_layer::setup_data_readers(0, m_mini_batch_size);
00052   }
00053 
00054   Zeros(*Acts, NumNeurons + 1, m_mini_batch_size);
00055   Zeros(X_local, NumNeurons + 1, m_mini_batch_size);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch::fp_linearity(
00059   ElMat&, ElMat&, ElMat&, ElMat&) {
00060   DataReader *data_reader = input_layer::select_data_reader();
00061   int num_samples_in_batch = 0;
00062 
00063   if (comm->get_rank_in_model() == m_root) {
00064     Zero(X_local);
00065     num_samples_in_batch = data_reader->fetch_data(X_local);
00066     bool data_valid = (num_samples_in_batch > 0);
00067     if(data_valid) {
00068       m_num_data_per_epoch+=num_samples_in_batch;
00069     }
00070 
00072     int linear_data_size = data_reader->get_linearized_data_size();
00073     for(size_t n = 0; n < m_mini_batch_size; n++) {
00074       X_local.Set(linear_data_size, n, 1);
00075     }
00076   }
00077 
00078   if (comm->get_rank_in_model() == m_root) {
00079     CopyFromRoot(X_local, Xs);
00080   }else {
00081     CopyFromNonRoot(Xs);
00082   }
00083 
00084   comm->model_barrier();
00085 
00086   Copy(Xs, *Acts);
00087 }
00088 
00092 bool lbann::input_layer_distributed_minibatch::update() {
00093   DataReader *data_reader = input_layer::select_data_reader();
00094   return !data_reader->update();
00095 }
